Name: Empty from square
Reason: h1h2 is illegal because there is no piece on the "from" square

Name: Take your own piece
Reason: You cannot capture your own piece

Name: Take enemy king
Reason: You cannot capture the enemy King

Name: Promote non-pawn
Reason: Only pawns can promote, and the moving piece is a K

Name: White promote off of eighth rank
Reason: White can only promote on the eighth rank

Name: Black promote off of first rank
Reason: Black can only promote on the first rank

Name: White cannot castle King-side
Reason: White has lost the privilege to castle King-side

Name: Black cannot castle King-side
Reason: Black has lost the privilege to castle King-side

Name: White cannot castle Queen-side
Reason: White has lost the privilege to castle Queen-side

Name: Black cannot castle Queen-side
Reason: Black has lost the privilege to castle Queen-side

Name: Castle off first rank
Reason: The White King needs to stay on the first row when castling

Name: Castle off eighth rank
Reason: The Black King needs to stay on the eighth row when castling
